H0.text: Where was the siege of the Alamo. Mexico

H1.text: Where was the siege of the Alamo. US-CA

H2.text: Where was the siege of the Alamo. US-NM

H3.text: Where was the siege of the Alamo. US-TX

A4.text: The Alamo Mission near San Antonio de Béxar (modern-day San Antonio, Texas, United States).

A5.text: The Battle of the Alamo (February 23 – March 6, 1836) was a pivotal event and military engagement in the Texas Revolution.
